article_title: Seven Major Provisions And How They Affect You

article_metadata.description: The American health care system is in a state of evolution not seen since the advent of modern medicine. What was considered to be the greatest system in the world may soon look more like Canada or Europe. Yes, change can be good, but in this case, we'll have to wait and see.
article_metadata.author: Mike Patton
